attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Monarchy is a feudal institution , unfit for a Western Liberal Democracy. It does not set a fit model for one of the World's oldest nation states.

This is not to say that the Royals do their job badly , or that a Republic would be cheaper , or that the human beings in either institution would not be fallible.

What it does say is that feudal relics , operating by hereditary principles have no place in the government of this great nation.

That some form of Republican government says what and where we want to be.

What was once in 1649 - 1660 can be again !

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition already online:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/republic/
If you wish your won to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
